result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Troy A. Olsen

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Amanda.
Case Called at 9:41 am. 
INCLUDES: 21CF1134, 21CF1314, 22CF23, 22CF440, 22CF1224. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig.  Defendant appears, pro se.   

COURT QUASHES WARRANT. 

Date and time set for Preliminary Hearing. 
Time Limits have been preserved; 
State notes SPD is still looking for an attorney to represent defendant. 

Court questions defendant re: proceeding today with Prelim. 
Time Limits are now WAIVED on all files. 

CC set for 11/9 at 8:05 am. 

C: branch 4.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 1:16 pm. 
INCLUDES: 22CF1224, 22CF23, 21CF1134, 21CF1314, 22CF440 & 21CT218.

Date and time set for review re: public defender representation prior to preliminary hearing. 
Defendant fails to appear. Defendant was given notice of this hearing at the Initial Appearance.
COURT notes Vinelink shows defendant has bonded out of Marathon County.
Prelim set for 10/26/2022 to be remain on calendar as deft. is not present today to question regarding counsel.
COURT ORDERS: BWA $1,500.00 (to cover all cases).

Adj: 1:20 pm.

Review hearing on October 21, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary Hearing on October 26, 2022 at 09:40 am.

INCLUDES 22CF1224, 22CF23, 22CF440, 21CF1314, 21CT218, 21CF1134. No contact with victim(s): (non-waiveable) A.G.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.  Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk:  Amy. 
Called:  3:06 p.m. 
INCLUDES 22CF1224, 22CF23, 22CF440, 21CF1314, 21CT218, 21CF1134.
State appears by ADA Natalie Zibolski.  Defendant appears in custody, via Zoom Video, and with Atty Paige Metzman.   

Date and time set for initial appearance in 22CF1224, 22CF23, 22CF440; VRCW. 
**COURT quashes any outstanding warrants** 

INITIAL APPEARANCE>>>22CF1224, 22CF23, 22CF440
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 

BOND:  $1500.00 cash bond to include all cases.  

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): (non-waivable) A.G.
- No operating vehicle without valid DL.  
- Absolute sobriety and no possession of controlled substances unless valid prescription and only as prescribed. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

RH:  10/21/22 at 1:00 p.m. 
PH:  10/26/22 at 9:40 a.m. 

Defendant's address is 614 Park Avenue, Wausau, WI  54403.

Adj:  3:10 p.m. 

Branch 4.
$30.00 warrant fee. Brought to jail by MNSO
